product_name: Rip Curl Candy Digital Watch - Women's
long_description: Perfect for a long day at the beach or in the water, the women's Rip Curl Candy Digital Watch offers a soft silicone case and strap for comfort, an easy-to-read display and sporty style. Features include dual time, date, stopwatch, countdown timer, alarm and backlight. ABS plastic case and comfortable silicone strap resist corrosion. The Rip Curl Candy Digital Watch resists water to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: Perfect for a long day at the beach or in the water, the women's Rip Curl Candy Digital Watch offers a soft silicone case and strap for comfort, an easy-to-read display and sporty style.
